00016  *
00017  * Authors: Zsolt Molnar <zsolt.molnar@cern.ch, http://www.zsoltmolnar.hu>
00018  *
00019  * Objects for dependency injection of SRM services.
00020  * (see: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dependency_injection)
00021  *
00022  * The goal: make the GFAL logic unit-testable by decoupling from the real SOAP
00023  * calls. Unit tests then create mock objects and create response objects
00024  * without real soap call / network operations.
00025  */
00026 
00027 /*
00028  * @(#)$RCSfile: srm_dependencies.h,v $ $Revision: 1.2 $ $Date: 2009/11/05 13:47:03 $ CERN Remi Mollon
00029  */
00030 #ifndef SRM_DEPENDENCIES_H__
00031 #define SRM_DEPENDENCIES_H__
00032 
00033 /* enforce proper calling convention */
00034 #ifdef __cplusplus
00035 extern "C"
00036 {
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 /* Function types of the appropriate SOAP calls */
00040 typedef int (*gfal_soap_call_prepare_to_get_fv)(
00041     struct soap *, const char *, const char *,
00042     struct srm2__srmPrepareToGetRequest *,
00043     struct srm2__srmPrepareToGetResponse_ *);
00044 
00045 typedef int (*gfal_soap_call_bring_online_fv)(
00046     struct soap *, const char *, const char *,
00047     struct srm2__srmBringOnlineRequest *,
00048     struct srm2__srmBringOnlineResponse_ *);
00049 
00050 typedef int (*gfal_soap_call_prepare_to_put_fv)(
00051     struct soap *, const char *, const char *,
00052     struct srm2__srmPrepareToPutRequest *,
00053     struct srm2__srmPrepareToPutResponse_ *);
00054 
00055 /* The collection of SOAP service calls. The pointers may be replaced with test
00056  * functions (dependency injection) */
00057 typedef struct gfal_soap_callers {
00058     gfal_soap_call_prepare_to_get_fv call_prepare_to_get;
00059     gfal_soap_call_bring_online_fv call_bring_online;
00060     gfal_soap_call_prepare_to_put_fv call_prepare_to_put;
00061 } gfal_soap_callers_t;
00062 
00063 /* For SRM v1 */
00064 extern gfal_soap_callers_t gfal_srm_callers_v1;
00065 
00066 /* For SRM v2 */
00067 extern gfal_soap_callers_t gfal_srm_callers_v2;
00068 
00069 #ifdef __cplusplus
00070 }
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 #endif /* #ifndef SRM_DEPENDENCIES_H__ */
